message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I believe it offers a great value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $130?
Hi Bob, I understand your position. How about we meet in the middle at $140?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, would it be possible to lower the price to $135?
